attributes.action: Ban custom essay and dissertation writing companies
attributes.additional_details:
As a recent graduate, having worked long and hard to achieve my degree, I am disgusted by the number of seemingly legal companies that will write essays/dissertations and many other pieces of work for students.

My intention with this petition is to change the law/rules around this area so that these companies are no longer legal, as to protect all those out there who may fall prey and be found out, and also those like me that work hard to get their degrees and have these companies undermining everything we have worked so hard for.
